00037 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 // Dialog for selection of device settings 
00039 // Use DXUTGetSettingsDialog() to access global instance
00040 // To control the contents of the dialog, use the CD3DEnumeration class.
00041 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
